If notability cannot be shown, the article is likely to be merged, redirected, or deleted. *Find sources:* "Camden Medical Centre" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(September 2019)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*Hospital in Singapore **Camden Medical** is a private medical centre in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It was established in 1999 and is located at One Orchard Boulevard near the [Tanglin](/wiki/Tanglin) and [Orchard Road](/wiki/Orchard_Road) area next to [Orchard Boulevard MRT station](/wiki/Orchard_Boulevard_MRT_station). Developed by the [Kwee brothers](/wiki/Kwee_family_(Pontiac)), the 17-storey cylindrical building was designed by Pritzker Prize laureate [Richard Meier](/wiki/Richard_Meier). ## Services The centre includes more than 200 medical and healthcare specialists and takes a holistic approach to healthcare and wellness, including prevention, diagnosis, treatment and rehabilitation. Available medical specialties include: [aesthetics](/wiki/Aesthetics); [plastic surgery](/wiki/Plastic_surgery); [cleft](/wiki/Orofacial_cleft) [craniofacial](/wiki/Craniofacial_surgery); [physiotherapy](/wiki/Physiotherapy); [endocrinology](/wiki/Endocrinology); [general practice](/wiki/General_practice); [health screening](/wiki/Health_screening); [dialysis](/wiki/Kidney_dialysis); laboratory services; [nutrition](/wiki/Nutrition) and [dietetics](/wiki/Dietetics); [obstetrics and gynaecology](/wiki/Obstetrics_and_gynaecology); [orthopaedics](/wiki/Orthopaedics); [paediatrics](/wiki/Paediatrics); [optometry](/wiki/Optometry) and [ophthalmology](/wiki/Ophthalmology); [podiatry](/wiki/Podiatry); [sports medicine](/wiki/Sports_medicine); and [traditional Chinese medicine](/wiki/Traditional_Chinese_medicine). Camden Medical also houses supporting medical facilities such as a [radiology](/wiki/Radiology) centre run by [Singapore General Hospital](/wiki/Singapore_General_Hospital) which offers [MRI](/wiki/Magnetic_resonance_imaging), [CT](/wiki/CT_scan) and [X-ray](/wiki/X-ray) imaging services; a clinical laboratory; a [molecular diagnostic](/wiki/Molecular_diagnostics) and microbiology laboratory; a dialysis centre; a rehabilitation centre and a pharmacy. In addition to a car park, there is a complimentary shuttle bus service from [Newton MRT station](/wiki/Newton_MRT_station). The centre also has an in-house [concierge](/wiki/Concierge) service to assist with arrangements such as wheelchair accommodation, cabs and booking meeting rooms. In 2019, HC Surgical and Medistar provided a subsidiary for a new endoscopy centre within the Camden Medical Centre. The new centre was set up to house over 150 new doctors. In 2020, Novena Lifecare bought 55% of stakes in the Aptus Surgery Centre at Paragon Medical Centre and Novaptus Surgery Centre located at Camden Medical Centre in a deal worth S$20 million.
